participant_1.background:
I have difficulty expressing my feelings to others.
i love chocolate cake with extra frosting.
I take care of my appearance, but I'm not a slave to it.
My home videos are a source of comfort and nostalgia, and they help me to stay positive even when things are tough.
i would rather stay up late than get up early.

participant_2.background:
I'm not a fan of Comic Con, but I do enjoy making organic cat food for my furry friend.
i am currently pregnant with my second child.
I want to show my music to the world!
I like a soft bed for my baby.
i have a missing pinky toe.

content.text: Hi! What's your favorite kind of cake?
I love chocolate cake with extra frosting!
Me too! I also enjoy staying up late. What is your favorite thing to do at night?
I love watching movies and playing video games. I have a cat and I enjoy making organic cat food for him.
That's really cool! I don't have any pets but I love watching movies and playing video games too.
My favorite movie is Spirited Away. It's an amazing animated movie from Japan.
I've never seen it! I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's one of my favorite movies of all time.
Well I'm sure I'll love it! I love everything animated!
Me too! I'm also a musician and I want to show my music to the world!
That's awesome! I love music too! Do you have any music online? I'd love to hear it!
Not yet! I'm still working on it but I'll let you know when I have something to share!
